abstract: Aetna completes agreement with pharmaceutical company Gilead Sciences that will allow it to offer new hepatitis C treatment at a discounted rate to its nearly 11 million commercial customers.
lead_paragraph: The third-largest U.S. health insurer said it would offer the drug as the preferred choice to its nearly 11 million commercial customers.
snippet: The third-largest U.S. health insurer said it would offer the drug as the preferred choice to its nearly 11 million commercial customers.

headline.main: Aetna and Gilead Reach Deal on Hepatitis C Drug
headline.print_headline: Aetna and Gilead Reach Deal on Hepatitis C Drug
